item.title: Purity
item.description: Description A female tiefling studying infernals at the Mage’s College in Neverwinter. Had a one-night stand with Horns before the party went to Baator for Horns’ court summons. Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Master Elian Amaadon
item.description: Master Elian Amaadon A powerful wizard and senior instructor of the Mage College in Neverwinter. Description Appearance Personality Displays earned confidence with a proper bearing. Shows patience and care for his students, even the wild ones.

item.title: Gregor
item.description: Description Gregor is a member of The Vigil and resides on Sigil. Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Gregor answered the call when Rinn’thalas sent and urgent message using his Amulet of the Vigil in 2022-08-03 Import Campaign.

item.title: Unidius
item.description: Description Basically a more violent, paranoid, D&D version of Mad-Eye Moody. Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Relationships The Vigil Unidius is occasionally (though perhaps reluctantly) used by The Vigil as a contact/operative in Neverwinter.

item.title: Gelfondi
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Gelfondi The devil in charge of the operations on the 42nd floor of Fierna’s tower. Description Appearance Gelfondi is a horned devil, slightly shorter than usual. He was wearing some type or robes when the party surprised him in 2022-02-02 Import Campaign.

item.title: Clear Wind
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Clear Wind A tabaxi bartender at the Moonlight All-Night Diner in Shadow Leilon. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Relationships Val Val is chatty with Clear Wind and calls her “Water Wendy”.

item.title: Denarial
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Denarial A sorceress and leader of a large contingent of drow in Shadow Leilon. Description Appearance A female drow. Personality Biography Key Info Denarial desires to take over as mayor of Shadow Leilon.

item.title: Elirion'tar
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Elirion’tar Brother to Val and was found working on a ship docked in Neverwinter. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Said he was on way to Chult and said the party could meet him later.

item.title: Aeortis
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Aeortis An apparent young girl who designed much Fierna’s tower. Description Appearance a (supposed) young girl, accompanied by three hellhounds Personality Biography Relationships Oneshoe In payment for giving information to the party, Aeortis required the party to perform a service for her and retrieve a particular soul coin from Fierna’s tower.

item.title: Belial
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Belial Belial is the lord of Phlegethos, who jointly rules the fourth layer together with his daughter Fierna. This unusual partnership was allowed by Asmodeus as an exception to the usual requirement of one ruler per layer.

item.title: Caerwyn Cadogan
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Caerwyn Cadogan A tuathan from the Feywild–once friend and a guide to the realm, now enemy after his betrayal at the Court of Stars. Description Appearance A handsome, anthromorphic fox.

item.title: Carmen
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Carmen Known as one of the most powerful and effective lawyers in Phlegethos. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Due to her extraordinary reputation, Carmen commands exceedingly high fees for her services.

item.title: Cassandra Belacourt
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Cassandra Belacourt Agent of The Reclamation – a party which seeks to reclaim artifacts that should not be out in the wild. Description Appearance A female drow.

item.title: Fierna
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Fierna Daughter of Belial, with whom she co-rules Phlegethos. Description Appearance Personality Described as fiery and even recklessly passionate. Biography Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Gundren Rockseeker
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Gundren Rockseeker Gundren Rockseeker was one of the three dwarf brothers who rediscovered Wave Echo Cave. Description Appearance Personality Biography Relationships Late Brothers brother to Tharden Rockseeker older brother to Nundro Rockseeker Val Gundren and Val become fast friends and drinking buddies.

item.title: Iarno Albrek
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Iarno Albrek human wizard, secret leader of The Redbrands under the name Glasstaff. Description Appearnce Personality Biography Key Info Previously a member of the Lord’s Alliance. Secretly the leader of The Redbrands.

item.title: Ignaroz
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Ignaroz Assistant to Carmen (?) who facilitates creation and administration of Tymphal’s Contract with the The Menagerie. Description Appearance First Meeting the Party a female spined devil, with white spines.

item.title: Keith Stone
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Keith Stone Stone Giant that provides hospitality for the party on the Road of Cinders. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Magrin
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Magrin A duergar who serves served as a chief manager of Tymphal’s operations. Description Appearance Initial Meeting in the Torture Room at Fierna’s Tower a now frail and despondent duergar, heavily beaten and lacking teeth After Tymphal’s Punishment Magrin’s essence is now confined within a green steel shield.

item.title: Melkor
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Melkor Contact that used to work at the tower Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Relationships Quotations Trivia

item.title: Nyx
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Nyx Gimble’s older sister, a rock gnome who is also gifted in Divination. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Growing up, Gimble was told he was an only child.

item.title: Oberon
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Oberon Oberon, Lord of Beasts, consort of Queen Titania, and member of the Seelie Court. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Incensed by the assassination attempt on Queen Titania that left her comatose, Oberon has been leading an unending form of The Wild Hunt.

item.title: Psithyron
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Psithyron An imp which still remains in the service of Horns, back from when Horns was a general of Hell. Description Appearance Personality Impish. Biography Key Info Early on in the campaign, Psithyron manifested as a small, devilish figure that Horns had with him when he washed ashore on the beach and Reidoth found him.

item.title: Queen Titania
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Queen Titania Archfey and queen of the Summer Court of the Feywild. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info While the party visited the Court of Stars, they witnessed an assassination attempt on Queen Titania which left her gravely injured.

item.title: Quilnorae
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Quilnorae Reportedly an elvish paladin whose soul ended up in a Soul Coin in Fierna’s tower. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Aeortis issues a quest for Oneshoe to retrieve the coin with the soul of Quilnorae.

item.title: Tymphal
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Tymphal A duke of Phlegethos, Tymphal was a mechanical master smith whose lesser devil legions and hundreds of duergar slaves toiled in a volcano forge to produce weapons and infernal constructs.

item.title: Veshvor
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Veshvor A patron of The Brimstone who crossed Magnanimy. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Veshvor won a special necklace from Magnanimy. Magnanimy took offense to Veshvor’s behavior and asked Rinn’thalas to secure the return of the necklace in exchange for some information.

item.title: Waybert Spinzig
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Waybert Spinzig A gnome researcher who arrived in Phandalin along with Zilry to study the incoming Modron March. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Relationships Zilry Zilry is a companion who joins in Wayberts’s study.

item.title: Wrath the Chain Devil
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Wrath the Chain Devil A powerful chain devil who reportedly may know something about the whereabouts of Ze’brak. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Magnanimy claimed that Ze’brak may have drawn the ire of Wrath.

item.title: Zarinor
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Zarinor A white dragon, found bound in chains on the 42nd-floor during the Caper at Fierna’s Tower. Description Appearance Large-sized, white dragon. Personality Abnormally docile and intelligent for a smaller white dragon.

item.title: Zilry
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Zilry An elf researcher who arrived in Phandalin along with Waybert to study the incoming Modron March. Description Appearance Personality Biography Key Info Relationships Waybert Spinzig Waybert is a companion who joins in Zilry’s study.

item.title: Magnanimy
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Magnanimy A regular patron of the The Brimstone, who seems to traffic in information. Description Looks to be a tiefling-ish, higher-class gentleman. Biography Key Info Magnanimy is fond of gambling.

item.title: Mirna Dendrar
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Mirna Dendrar Description Human commoner from Phandalin Biography When she was a young girl, she and her family fled from the town of Thundertree after undead overran the place.

item.title: Nezznar, The Black Spider
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Nezznar, The Black Spider Description drow wizard (deceased) Biography Key Info defeated by the party in The Wave Echo Cave Relationships Quotations Trivia source of Gimble’s Spider Staff

item.title: Nundro Rockseeker
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Nundro Rockseeker Nundro Rockseeker was one of the three dwarf brothers who rediscovered Wave Echo Cave. Description Appearance Personality Biography Relationships younger brother to Gundren Rockseeker younger brother to Tharden Rockseeker Key Info slain in The Wave Echo Cave by forces of The Black Spider Quotations Trivia References

item.title: Reidoth
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Reidoth Description Reidoth is a gaunt, white-bearded human who doesn’t use two words when one word will do. Though he receives very few visitors, he is reasonably hospitable.

item.title: Sildar Hallwinter
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Sildar Hallwinter Human soldier and member of the Lords’ Alliance who accompanies Gundren Rockseeker on travel from Neverwinter to Phandalin. Description Appearance Personality Seemed sincere in his desire to help the townsfolk of Phandalin.

item.title: Sister Garaele
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Sister Garaele Description Elf cleric of Tymora who tends the Luck Shrine in town. Biography Key Info member of The Harpers sent party on a quest to get information from a banshee named Agatha about the location of Bowgentle’s spellbook Relationships Gimble Taught Gimble the ritual for Gentle Repose Quotations Trivia

item.title: Tharden Rockseeker
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Tharden Rockseeker Tharden Rockseeker was one of the three dwarf brothers who rediscovered Wave Echo Cave. Description Appearance Personality Biography Relationships older brother to Gundren Rockseeker older brother to Nundro Rockseeker Key Info The dwarf was slain by forces under the command of Nezznar, The Black Spider.

item.title: The Tinkerer
item.description: Import Campaign Characters Harold Peters You know, the Tinkerer. Description Appearance Personality Biography Originally from the Sword Coast, Harold Peters (you know, the Tinkerer) somehow found himself lost in Shadow Leilon.
